form.SN:
Uporabljamo tudi obliko
for ever
, razen pri 3. pomenu.

sense.def:
To happen or continue forever
pomeni ves čas se dogajati ali trajati v neskončnost.

seg.quote: They thought that their empire would last forever.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
has gone forever
, je minilo in se ne bo več pojavilo.

To be forever doing something
pomeni nekaj početi zelo pogosto;
sense.usg: pogovorna raba, ki pogosto izraža neodobravanje.

seg.quote: Babbage was forever spotting errors in their calculations.
